library(htmltools)
library(yaml)

mbrs <- yaml.load_file("members.yml")

mbr_divs <- lapply(mbrs, function(mbr){
      mbr_img <- mbr[["image"]]

      new_mbr <- div(class = "member",  
        # Image can't start with "/"
        div(class = "memberImage",
            tags$img(src = gsub("^\\/(.*)","\\1", mbr_img),
             alt = mbr[["name"]],
             style = "max-height:100px;max-width:80px;float:left")
            ),
        div(class = "memberProfile", p(mbr$description),
            style="float:right;text-align:justify;"))
        new_mbr
})
  
#div(class = "col-2",
tagList(mbr_divs)
#)
